spell_tooltip.description:
Purify now has a maximum of 2 charges.

Removing harmful effects with Purify grants your target an absorption shield equal to 5% of their maximum health. Lasts 8 sec.
You ascend into the air out of harm's way. While floating, your spell range is increased by 50%, but you are only able to cast Holy spells.

Assault an enemy's mind, dealing 321,712 Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

For 7 sec, the next 1.1 million damage they deal will heal their target, and the next 1.1 million healing they deal will damage their target.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 761,357 over 21 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 141,364 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 6 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 122,677 Holy damage to enemies and up to 33,366 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Shackles the target undead enemy for 50 sec, preventing all actions and movement. Damage will cancel the effect. Limit 1.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal, Heal, or Holy Word: Serenity.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 181,811 and dealing 239,202 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 5 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 2 million.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Heal or Flash Heal.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 11 yds for 570,003.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 12 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.

Chastises the target for 409,535 Holy damage and stuns them for 4 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 4 sec when you cast Smite or Holy Nova.
A powerful prayer that heals the target and the 4 nearest allies within 40 yards for 345,023.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
Holy Word: Chastise stuns the target for 4 sec and is not broken by damage.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 40 yards for 129,695.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Heals all party or raid members within 40 yards for 1.4 million over 4.2 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 40 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.3 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Renew reduces the cooldown of Sanctify by an additional 6 sec and heals for 120% more when cast, but has a 12 sec cooldown.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.

Your healing is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.

Casting Apotheosis causes your next 3 Heal or Prayer of Healing casts to be instant and heal for 25% more.
25% of healing done by Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to the previous target you healed with those spells.
The cooldowns of your Holy Words are reduced by an additional 10% when you cast the relevant spells.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 20%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 15%.
Increases the healing done by your Mastery: Echo of Light by 15% and your Renew by 40%.

Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.

Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.

Gain access to a spell that gives you an advantage against your fate.  Premonition rotates to the next spell when cast.

 Premonition of Insight
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 9.8 sec.

 Premonition of Piety
Increases your healing done by 28% and causes 98% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec. 

 Premonition of Solace
Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 3.5 million damage and reduces their damage taken by 21% for 15 sec.

Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by 40%.

All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by 40%.
Increases the duration of all Renews by 40%.
Premonition causes your next Heal or Prayer of Healing cast to be instant and cost 15% less mana.
Prayer of Mending casts apply a Power Word: Shield to your target at 100% effectiveness.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
Guardian Spirit lasts an additional 2 sec.
Your Flash Heal, Heal, and Holy Word: Serenity are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.
An additional 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending is placed on a second ally within 40 yards when casting Prayer of Mending.
Increases the effects of Premonition by 40%.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 761,357 over 21 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.

Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Chastises the target for 412,146 Holy damage and stuns them for 4 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 4 sec when you cast Smite or Holy Nova.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
Holy Word: Chastise stuns the target for 4 sec and is not broken by damage.

Holy Word: Chastise causes your next 2 casts of Holy Fire to be instant, cost no mana, and incur no cooldown.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 40 yards for 133,291.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Increases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.

Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.

Heals all party or raid members within 40 yards for 1.4 million over 4.2 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 40 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.3 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Renew reduces the cooldown of Sanctify by an additional 6 sec and heals for 120% more when cast, but has a 12 sec cooldown.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.

Your healing is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.

Casting Apotheosis causes your next 3 Heal or Prayer of Healing casts to be instant and heal for 25% more.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.
Increases the healing done by your Mastery: Echo of Light by 15% and your Renew by 40%.
Increases healing by 20% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.
Your healing done is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After 4 sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 140,060 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain or Holy Fire deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 40% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
Your Holy Fire critical strikes reduce your target's movement speed by 75% for 4 sec.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 1.0% Mana.
Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 180,964 and dealing 239,664 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 40 yards is healed for 252,966.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 8%.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain or Holy Fire.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 219,505 Shadow damage plus an additional 249,108 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 30,506 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.
